title: Beauty for Ashes
description: It was the perfect contract for a marriage of convenience to a woman he didn't know. Didn't want to know. Justin Randolph, a wealthy widower, believes love is a myth. He's only marrying to provide his children with a mother.Mistaken for Justin's intended, Elizabeth Frazier seizes the opportunity to escape a forced marriage. Like Justin, Elizabeth marries, not seeking love, but safety. God, however, has a different plan....
author: Dorothy Clark
